message:
### Error querying database.  Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'createbyid' in 'field list'
### The error may exist in file [E:\idea_work\openbbs\target\classes\mapping\UserMapper.xml]
### The error may involve defaultParameterMap
### The error occurred while setting parameters
### SQL: select             id,user_login_name,user_real_name,user_login_password,user_email,user_score,user_level,user_banlance,user_corp,user_nickname,user_photo,user_login_date,remarks,createbyid,createbyname,createdate,updatebyid,updatebyname,updatedate,delflag         from bbs_user LIMIT 5
### Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'createbyid' in 'field list'
; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'createbyid' in 'field list'
